Canal Street Market is a
carefully curated retail market,
food hall & community space
open year-round at 265 Canal
Street.

A New Kind
of Market

  • Merging retail, food, art, and culture, Canal Street Market highlights top retail and design concepts, restaurants, and up-and-coming players in the downtown New York City community.

  • Retail Market Hours:
    Mon – Sat: 11AM – 7PM
    Sun: 11AM – 6PM

  • Food Hall Hours:
    Mon – Sat: 10AM- 9PM
    Sun: 10AM - 6PM
